Q_DESC:
To find out the student details using multiple inheritance. 

Declare the base class student.
Declare and define the function get() to get the student details.
Declare the other class sports.
Declare and define the function getsm() to read the sports mark.
Create the class statement derived from student and sports.
Declare and define the function display() to find out the total and average.
Declare the derived class object,call the functions get(),getsm() and display().
